verses.verse: (A psalm written by David for people going up to the temple to worship) Yahweh, I am not proud and I have not thought highly about ◄myself/the things that I have done►. And I do not worry about things that you have done that are very big or very wonderful.
Instead, I am calm and peaceful in my inner being, like a small child who lies quietly at its mother's breast [SIM]. In the same way, I am peaceful within my inner being.
You my fellow Israelis, confidently expect that Yahweh will do good things for you, now and forever!
